title: The Premier League
summary: Comprehensive Rebranding and Feature Development: Led the complete redesign of the Premier League site, enhancing performance, accessibility, and user experience using modern web technologies. Key features included the Awards Page and Man of the Match Page.
Collaborative Full-Stack Contributions: Worked across frontend and backend, aligning with product managers, designers, and developers to deliver scalable, user-centric solutions.
Continuous Optimisation: Maintained site stability through continuous deployment practices, addressing bugs and optimising code for performance.
